alert.note: Alert for Graham (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 5:35PM MST until August 13 at 6:15PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Graham County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 615 PM MST. * At 535 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles east of San Carlos, or 27 miles east of Globe, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly remote areas of northwestern Graham County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
